General.Name: Sfinks Polska S.A.
General.Description: Sfinks Polska S.A. operates and franchises restaurants in the casual dining sector in Poland. The company operates a network of 117 restaurants under the Sphinx, WOOK, and Chlopskie Jadlo brand names. Sfinks Polska S.A. was founded in 1995 and is based in Zalesie Górne, Poland.
